Description.Text: Arena Ipanema Hotel is just 100 m from the famous Ipanema Beach. The hotel has an outdoor pool and sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each room has a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Free toiletries are offered, and a hair dryer is available. At the hotel, guests can relax at the sauna or exercise at the on-site fitness centre. Other facilities include a 24-hour front desk and bike hire.
